snippet: Seeking to end a long unsuccessful run, Oakland has acquired several players in their 30s with Pro Bowl and Super Bowl experience in the hope that they will lead and mentor the younger players.
lead_paragraph: Seeking to end a long unsuccessful run, Oakland has acquired several players in their 30s with Pro Bowl and Super Bowl experience in the hope that they will lead and mentor the younger players.

headline.main: In an Effort to Become Wiser, the Raiders Try to Become Older
headline.print_headline: In an Effort to Become Wiser, the Raiders Try to Become Older
